title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
After yet another blowout loss and a season sweep to the Clippers, Colin explained why the Lakers season is officially over and how the Russell Westbrook experiment was a colossal disaster.  Also, Colin thinks the Cowboys should rethink their decision to move on from Amari Cooper. Former NBA star Raja Bell told us why Russ has been a poor fit in LA and why LeBron James needs pieces around him who fit his evolving game

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
